item.title: 美国在线食品价格自科维德事件以来首次出现同比下降
item.description: 10 月份的在线杂货价格比去年同期有所下降，这是自四年多前 Covid 出现以来的首次下降。【原文：Online grocery prices declined in October from a year earlier, the first such drop since the arrival of Covid more than four years ago.】

item.title: 泰森公司预测 2025 年盈利将因鸡肉业务好转而增加
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc.【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. said it expects results to improve next year as a turnaround in the chicken business and rising demand for prepared foods offsets losses in beef.】

item.title: 埃克森首席执行官深入狮穴兜售化石燃料
item.description:
达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）告诉《公约》缔约方会议，需求将持续上升，世界需要进行能源转型，这对他这样的公司来说是有利可图的。【原文：

Darren Woods tells COP that demand will keep rising, and the world needs an energy transition that’s profitable for companies like his.

】

item.title: 马斯克投资公司在市场风险最高的领域起飞
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的日间交易粉丝俱乐部正在疯狂买入市场上一些投机性最强的股票，从开玩笑的加密货币 Dogecoin 到将 SpaceX 列为主要持股的有争议的封闭式基金 —；所有这些都是希望唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的当选能释放出更多的动物精神。【原文：Elon Musk’s day-trading fan club is on a buying spree in some of the most speculative parts of the market, from the joke cryptocurrency Dogecoin to a controversial closed-end fund that counts SpaceX among its key holdings — all in hopes that Donald Trump’s election will release more animal spirits.】

item.title: Shopify 第三季度营收超预期，股价大涨
item.description: Shopify Inc. 公布的第三季度销售额超过了分析师的预期，这表明随着消费继续从商店转向网站，这家加拿大电子商务公司的发展势头越来越好。【原文：Shopify Inc. soared after reporting third-quarter sales that beat analysts’ estimates, a sign that the Canadian e-commerce company is gaining momentum as spending continues to shift from stores to websites.】

item.title: 中国对 K-Pop 的重新开放可能因特朗普回国而受阻
item.description: 韩国公司因有望在中国获得新机遇而股价大涨。但首先...【原文：Shares in South Korean companies are buoyant on hopes for new opportunities in China. But first...】

item.title: 波兰决策者达布罗夫斯基将降息时间推迟至 2025 年第三季度
item.description: 一位资深决策者表示，在通胀顽固和财政政策宽松的情况下，波兰应将降息时间推迟到 2025 年第三季度。【原文：Poland should push back the timing of interest rate cuts until the third quarter of 2025 amid stubborn inflation and loose fiscal policy, according to a senior policymaker.】

item.title: 地中海航运公司在南部非洲看到了物流商机
item.description: 在纳米比亚海岸的一个前鲸鱼和海豹狩猎前哨卸下长约 80 米（263 英尺）的风力涡轮机叶片，是非洲全球物流公司在非洲大陆发现的越来越多机会中较为偏远的一个例子。【原文：Unloading wind turbine blades around 80 meters (263 feet) in length at a former whale and seal hunting outpost on the coast of Namibia is one of the more remote examples of growing opportunities found by Africa Global Logistics on the continent.】

item.title: 阿波罗投资金融科技，提升私募服务水平
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is investing in startup Vega and adopting its technology that looks to improve service for clients looking to further their investments in private markets.】

item.title: 巴西央行警告加息周期将延长
item.description: 巴西央行警告说，通胀预期的进一步恶化可能导致更持久的紧缩周期，此前几天，决策者们将加息步伐加快了一倍。【原文：Brazil’s central bank warned that additional deterioration of inflation expectations could lead to a more protracted tightening cycle, days after policymakers doubled the pace of their interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 欧佩克连续第四个月下调全球石油需求增长预测
item.description: 欧佩克连续第四个月下调了今明两年的石油需求增长预测，因为它姗姗来迟地意识到了第一大消费国中国的经济增长放缓。【原文：OPEC cut its oil demand growth forecasts for this year and next for a fourth consecutive month as it belatedly recognized a slowdown in top consumer China.】

item.title: 打败 TikTok 和 Lazada 后，Sea 盈利超出预期
item.description: Sea Ltd. 的电子商务部门在调整后的基础上首次实现了季度盈利，这表明该公司在印尼等东南亚市场与中国大型竞争对手的竞争中占据了上风。【原文：Sea Ltd.’s e-commerce arm turned its first quarterly profit on an adjusted basis, a sign it’s holding its own against bigger Chinese rivals in Southeast Asian markets like Indonesia.】

item.title: 股票怀疑论者正在追赶特朗普的涨势
item.description: 整整一年，选股人都被风险资产无休止的涨势弄得措手不及。现在，随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得总统大选，S&P 500 指数创下了今年的第 51 个记录，赶上这股热潮正成为职业生涯的一件大事。【原文：All year, stock pickers have been caught off-guard by the never-ending rally in risk assets. Now, with the S&P 500 notching its 51st record of the year, following Donald Trump’s presidential victory, catching up with the boom is becoming a career-defining matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司收到欧盟警告，要求停止在应用程序和 ITunes 商店实施地理限制
item.description: 苹果公司接到欧盟通知，称其地理屏蔽做法可能违反了消费者保护规则，这加剧了这家 iPhone 制造商在欧盟的监管问题。【原文：Apple Inc. was notified by the European Union that its geo-blocking practices are potentially in breach of consumer protection rules, adding to the iPhone maker’s regulatory issues in the bloc.】

item.title: 私人信贷提升巴西放贷人的投行财富
item.description: 私人信贷基金的激增和创纪录的地方债券销售，正在帮助巴西最大的贷款机构从美国竞争对手手中抢夺投资银行市场份额。【原文：A surge in private-credit funds and record local bond sales are helping Brazil’s biggest lenders snag investment-banking market share from US competitors.】

item.title: 卡塔尔挑选卡塔尔投资管理局美洲部主管管理 5100 亿美元的财富基金
item.description: 卡塔尔任命穆罕默德-苏韦迪（Mohammed Al Suwaidi）为其价值 5100 亿美元的主权财富基金的新任首席执行官，这对投资者来说是一个关键时刻。【原文：Qatar named Mohammed Al Suwaidi as the new chief executive officer of its $510 billion sovereign wealth fund at a crucial juncture for the investor that’s expected to receive billions of dollars over the next few years as the Gulf state ramps up gas production.】

item.title: 欧元与美元平价是货币分析师的新呼声
item.description: 在美国大选之后，货币策略师们放弃了对欧元的预测，并提出了新的看法：欧元将向与美元平价的方向下滑。【原文：Currency strategists are ripping up forecasts for the euro in the wake of the US election and coming up with a new call: a slide toward parity with the dollar.】

item.title: Foschini 在南非的快速送货服务向 Shein 和亚马逊发起挑战
item.description: 随着全球巨头亚马逊（Amazon）、Shein 和 Temu 在南非电子商务市场的积极扩张，Foschini 集团有限公司正在其主场发起挑战。【原文：The Foschini Group Ltd. is mounting a challenge on its home turf as global giants Amazon, Shein, and Temu expand aggressively in South Africa’s e-commerce market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将加强对银行地缘政治风险的关注
item.description: 随着监管主管克劳迪娅-布赫（Claudia Buch）对欧洲中央银行的认可，欧洲中央银行计划要求银行提供更多有关地缘政治风险敞口的信息。【原文：The European Central Bank plans to demand more information from banks about their exposure to geopolitical risks as supervision head Claudia Buch puts her stamp on the institution.】

item.title: 恶劣天气促进 DIY 销售，家得宝上调业绩展望
item.description: 家得宝公司（Home Depot Inc.）上调了对今年一项关键销售指标的预期，因为最近一个季度恶劣的天气支撑了对家居装饰材料的需求。【原文：Home Depot Inc. lifted its forecast of a key sales metric for the year after adverse weather propped up demand for home-improvement materials in the latest quarter.】

item.title: 联盟提升信心后南非发行欧洲债券
item.description: 南非正在销售欧元债券，这是继 5 月大选之后，南非在民族团结政府领导下可能进行的首次国际债务销售。【原文：South Africa is marketing eurobonds in its first potential international debt sale under a government of national unity following May elections.】

item.title: 食品价格上涨导致印度通胀率升至 14 个月高点
item.description: 印度的通胀率以 14 个月来最快的速度上升，突破了中央银行的容忍度，使其有充分理由保持谨慎，即使降息的呼声日益高涨。【原文：India’s inflation quickened at the fastest pace in 14 months, breaching the central bank’s tolerance level and giving it a strong reason to stay cautious, even as calls grow to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心因政治纷争和特朗普获胜而下滑
item.description: 在德国工业界接连传出坏消息、三党制政府垮台以及唐纳德-特朗普当选之后，投资者对德国经济的信心在 11 月份意外恶化。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy unexpectedly worsened in November after a spate of bad news from the country’s industry, the collapse of the three-party government and the election of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 越南命令社交媒体公司提供用户身份信息
item.description: 越南正在命令外国社交媒体平台核实用户账户，并按要求向当局提供用户身份信息，此举旨在加强共产党政府对社交网络的控制。【原文：Vietnam is ordering foreign social media platforms to verify the accounts of users and provide their identifies to authorities on demand, a move to tighten the Communist government’s control of social networks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯海运原油量因北极航运量增加而反弹
item.description:
截至11月10日的一周内，三艘油轮在摩尔曼斯克码头装载原油

。【原文：

Three tankers loaded crude at the Murmansk terminal in the week to Nov. 10

】

item.title: 英国即将与沙特阿拉伯等海湾国家签署自由贸易协定
item.description: 据几位熟悉内情的人士透露，英国与包括沙特阿拉伯在内的一批石油资源丰富的中东国家的自由贸易协定谈判已进入最后阶段。【原文：The UK is in the final stages of negotiating a free trade agreement with a group of oil-rich Middle Eastern nations including Saudi Arabia, according to several people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国最大工会就金属工人薪酬达成重要协议
item.description: 德国最大的工会与雇主达成了一项重要的工资协议，可能会提高约 390 万工人的工资，并避免该国陷入困境的制造业发生罢工。【原文：Germany’s biggest labor union struck a key wage agreement with employers that may raise pay for about 3.9 million workers and avert strikes in the country’s beleaguered manufacturing sector.】

item.title: 大众汽车应对欧洲汽车制造商债券市场动荡
item.description: 本周二，大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）的一个实体将发行新债，这将在欧洲汽车制造商的艰难时期考验债券投资者的需求。【原文：A Volkswagen AG entity is looking to raise new debt on Tuesday in an offering that will test demand among bond investors during a tough time for European carmakers.】

item.title: 美联储称投票后美国股票投资激增至 11 年新高
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项调查显示，在总统大选后，由于对经济增长强劲持乐观态度，投资者对美股的持仓量跃升至2013年以来的最高点。【原文：Investor exposure to US stocks jumped to the highest since 2013 after the presidential election, on optimism around stronger economic growth, according to a survey from Bank of America Corp.】
